pullrequest.title: Change cmake project name to sdformat8, export cmake targets

content.raw: We can either use the `PKGCONFIG` argument of `ign_find_package(~)` in `ign-sensors` or we could set `sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_ENTRY` and `sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE` variables in `sdformat8-config.cmake`. Either would work just fine, but the latter would transfer over to all ignition libraries that depend on `sdformat8`.
content.html: We can either use the PKGCONFIG argument of ign_find_package(~) in ign-sensors or we could set sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_ENTRY and sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE variables in sdformat8-config.cmake. Either would work just fine, but the latter would transfer over to all ignition libraries that depend on sdformat8.
